data.title: Plan Your Visit
data.meta_description: Plan Your Visit. LIBRARY LOCATION: The Ronald Reagan Presidential Library and Museum is located in Southern California, in the city of Simi Valley, CA.
data.text:
LIBRARY LOCATION:

The Ronald Reagan Presidential Library and Museum is located in Southern California, in the city of Simi Valley, CA.

Ronald Reagan Presidential Library

40 Presidential Drive Simi Valley, CA. 93065

For directions, select one of the following: Yahoo | Google

GPS Users: Please note that our entrance is off of Madera Road. Some GPS devices take drivers to Tierra Rejada â€“ this road does not lead to the Reagan Library. Our entrance is on Presidential Drive, accessible only from Madera Road.

PARKING OPTIONS:

Parking is free and there are a limited number of bus stalls.

RV parking is available on Presidential Drive (Visitor Parking lot is too narrow for RVs). RVs should proceed up the hill and go around the traffic circle so they are headed back down Presidential Drive and select the nearest on-street parking. Or you may park going uphill prior to entering the traffic circle.
